results.text: እርሷ በገሀነም አዘቅት ውስጥ የምትወጣ ዛፍ ናት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እነርሱም ከእርሷ በይዎች ናቸው፤ ሆዶችንም ከእርሷ ሞይዎች ናቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም ለእነርሱ በእርሷ ላይ ከተኳሳ ውሃ ቅልቅል (መጠጥ) አልላቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም መመለሻቸው ወደ ተጋጋመች እሳት ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
